alert.note: Alert for Orange (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 16 at 3:37AM EST until December 16 at 10:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Wet Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 2 inches near Otisville and Port Jervis and west of Route 209, little to no snow accumulation to the east. Total snow accumulations will range from 1 to 3 inches east of Walden, Goshen and Warwick, to 3 to 6 inches most places west of there, to as much as 8 to 10 inches in the highest elevations near Otisville and Port Jervis and west of 209. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Orange County. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Scattered downed tree limbs and power lines to the north of I-84 and particularly west of Route 209. Plan on slippery road conditions during the morning commute. Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Check local Department of Transportation information services for the latest road conditions.
